experiences.title: Senior Developer
experiences.description:
Engaged in the development and maintenance of web applications and enterprise systems, leveraging technologies such as C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET, SQL Server, Entity Framework, Web APIs and Microsoft Azure services, while adhering to agile methodologies.
Played a key role in the creation of Atento AI Studio, an artificial intelligence initiative designed to simulate customer service scenarios, enhancing candidate management processes during the selection phase.
Conceptualized and implemented a Talent Reallocation System, optimizing post-contract employee management and achieving a 60% improvement in talent retention.
